drive.label: Drive
drive.value: Hunt and dominate those he deems worthy prey.,Prove his superiority over both humans and beasts.,Struggle against his own savage nature.,Seek a cure or embrace his transformation fully.

abilities.label: Abilities
abilities.value:
• Enhanced strength, speed, and senses
  • Razor-sharp metal claws
  • Rapid healing factor
  • Pack coordination with allies

biography.label: Notes
biography.value: Frederick Rice was once a brilliant biologist, obsessed with unlocking the secrets of nature. His experiments to merge human and wolf DNA succeeded—but at a terrible cost. Now known as Fenris, he battles the savage instincts of his new form, torn between his human intellect and the primal urges of the beast. He operates as a mercenary, taking contracts that allow him to hunt and dominate, but his past haunts him. Fenris despises weakness, both in others and himself, and his actions often reflect this inner turmoil.

system.description: When Fenris catches the scent of his prey, he moves with terrifying speed, closing the distance before they can react. He snarls as he lunges, his claws flashing in the dim light, ready to @UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.llXD7GIZiU5z5MiG.JournalEntryPage.aiXzW3H0z4NREaFc]{inflict a Condition} or @UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.llXD7GIZiU5z5MiG.JournalEntryPage.u8A6Gk7GoqBIMQBs]{capture someone} if they hesitate. The scent of fear only drives him faster.

Fenris throws back his head and lets out a bone-chilling howl that echoes through the battlefield. The sound is paralyzing, forcing everyone to @UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.llXD7GIZiU5z5MiG.JournalEntryPage.aiXzW3H0z4NREaFc]{mark Afraid} or freeze in place. Those who resist find themselves @UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.llXD7GIZiU5z5MiG.JournalEntryPage.aiXzW3H0z4NREaFc]{@UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.llXD7GIZiU5z5MiG.JournalEntryPage.J6NDHhQ2xeaHUZ6Y]{endangered by his pack} closing in.

Fenris circles his prey, his golden eyes gleaming with calculated hunger. He waits for the perfect moment to strike, @UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.llXD7GIZiU5z5MiG.JournalEntryPage.sSBCr0W3EJYs6Tg7]{announcing between-panel threats} as he stalks closer. If ignored, he lunges with brutal precision, aiming to @UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.llXD7GIZiU5z5MiG.JournalEntryPage.aiXzW3H0z4NREaFc]{inflict a Condition} or @UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.llXD7GIZiU5z5MiG.JournalEntryPage.u8A6Gk7GoqBIMQBs]{capture someone}.

Fenris signals his allies with a growl, coordinating their attacks with lethal efficiency. They flank the heroes, cutting off escape routes and @UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.llXD7GIZiU5z5MiG.JournalEntryPage.J6NDHhQ2xeaHUZ6Y]{@UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.llXD7GIZiU5z5MiG.JournalEntryPage.J6NDHhQ2xeaHUZ6Y]{putting innocents in danger} to divide their attention. If the heroes don’t act fast, someone will @UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.llXD7GIZiU5z5MiG.JournalEntryPage.J6NDHhQ2xeaHUZ6Y]{@UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.llXD7GIZiU5z5MiG.JournalEntryPage.u8A6Gk7GoqBIMQBs]{get captured} or worse.

Fenris’s control slips, and his savage nature takes over. He attacks with reckless fury, @UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.llXD7GIZiU5z5MiG.JournalEntryPage.y38zWkHIGzqyZmGc]{@UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.llXD7GIZiU5z5MiG.JournalEntryPage.y38zWkHIGzqyZmGc]{inflicting collateral damage} as he tears through the environment. Heroes who try to stop him must @UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.llXD7GIZiU5z5MiG.JournalEntryPage.y38zWkHIGzqyZmGc]{@UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.llXD7GIZiU5z5MiG.JournalEntryPage.89UPbdTtpbs4kmP3]{pay a price for victory} or risk being overwhelmed.

Fenris’s instincts scream at him to flee, his fur bristling as he backs away. He snarls threats, promising to return, and @UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.w5RMQhyRMu0Kz8Bh.JournalEntryPage.Xp8um8mddjyw1T7N]{@UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.w5RMQhyRMu0Kz8Bh.JournalEntryPage.Xp8um8mddjyw1T7N]{gives ground} to regroup. If chased, he @UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.w5RMQhyRMu0Kz8Bh.JournalEntryPage.Xp8um8mddjyw1T7N]{@UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.llXD7GIZiU5z5MiG.JournalEntryPage.sSBCr0W3EJYs6Tg7]{announces between-panel threats} about what he’ll do next.

Fenris’s rage consumes him, and he attacks without thought, @UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.llXD7GIZiU5z5MiG.JournalEntryPage.y38zWkHIGzqyZmGc]{@UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.llXD7GIZiU5z5MiG.JournalEntryPage.y38zWkHIGzqyZmGc]{inflicting collateral damage} as he swings wildly. He @UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.llXD7GIZiU5z5MiG.JournalEntryPage.y38zWkHIGzqyZmGc]{@UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.w5RMQhyRMu0Kz8Bh.JournalEntryPage.7bUuUXo8ob2I9rx3]{lashes out verbally}, hurling insults and threats, daring anyone to stand against him.

Fenris’s human side resurfaces, and he growls in self-disgust. He @UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.llXD7GIZiU5z5MiG.JournalEntryPage.aiXzW3H0z4NREaFc]{@UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.llXD7GIZiU5z5MiG.JournalEntryPage.vbmelu6amDCsv8Xp]{tells them who they should be}, demanding they prove their strength or leave him be. If they refuse, he @UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.llXD7GIZiU5z5MiG.JournalEntryPage.aiXzW3H0z4NREaFc]{@UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.llXD7GIZiU5z5MiG.JournalEntryPage.aiXzW3H0z4NREaFc]{inflicts a Condition} to push them away.

Fenris whimpers, his tail tucked as he retreats into the shadows. He @UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.w5RMQhyRMu0Kz8Bh.JournalEntryPage.Xp8um8mddjyw1T7N]{@UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.w5RMQhyRMu0Kz8Bh.JournalEntryPage.Xp8um8mddjyw1T7N]{gives ground}, refusing to fight, and @UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.w5RMQhyRMu0Kz8Bh.JournalEntryPage.Xp8um8mddjyw1T7N]{@UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.llXD7GIZiU5z5MiG.JournalEntryPage.vbmelu6amDCsv8Xp]{tells them who he is}—a monster beyond redemption.

Fenris bares his teeth, desperate to prove his dominance. He @UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.llXD7GIZiU5z5MiG.JournalEntryPage.aiXzW3H0z4NREaFc]{@UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.llXD7GIZiU5z5MiG.JournalEntryPage.vbmelu6amDCsv8Xp]{tells them who they should fear}, lunging at the weakest link to @UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.llXD7GIZiU5z5MiG.JournalEntryPage.aiXzW3H0z4NREaFc]{@UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.llXD7GIZiU5z5MiG.JournalEntryPage.aiXzW3H0z4NREaFc]{inflict a Condition} and regain control.
@UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.JournalEntry.llXD7GIZiU5z5MiG.JournalEntryPage.voNk2PNNF7oNqnSn]{Make a Playbook Move}
